about_the_game:
Discover the creative journey behind Ink Inside with this exclusive digital artbook. Dive into the sketches, concepts, and behind-the-scenes illustrations that brought the world of Stick and their vibrant, hand-drawn universe to life.

Featuring beautifully curated pages of original concept art, character designs, and world-building notes, the Ink Inside Artbook offers fans a unique glimpse into the artistic process that shaped the game’s unforgettable style. Whether you’re an aspiring artist, a fan of the game, or simply love beautiful art, this DLC is a must-have addition to your collection.

Key Features:

  • High-resolution pages showcasing character designs, environments, and early concepts.

  • Exclusive commentary from the creators, detailing the evolution of the art and story.

  • Insight into the development process of a hand-drawn, Saturday Morning Cartoon-inspired adventure.

  • Bonus sketches and illustrations that didn’t make it into the final game.

Celebrate the artistry and creativity of Ink Inside with this lovingly crafted companion to the game!
